#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int dp[1005][1005];

char a[1005],b[1005];

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	
	int test,num = 0;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	 {
	     int p,q;
	     num++;
	     cin>>p>>q;
	     
	     scanf("%s",a+1);
	     scanf("%s",b+1);
	     
	     dp[0][0] = 0;
	     for(int i=1;i<=p;i++)
	      dp[0][i] = i;
	     for(int i=1;i<=q;i++)
	      dp[i][0] = i;
	      
	     for(int i=1;i<=p;i++)
	      {
	          for(int j=1;j<=q;j++)
	           {
	               if(a[i] == b[j])
	                dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1]+1;
	               else
	                dp[i][j] = min(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]) + 1;
	           }
	      }
	      
	      printf("Case %d: %d\n",num,dp[p][q]);
	     
	 }
	
	return 0;
}
